Articles.Content:
I am not sure yet, but I am considering getting a small(?) 3D printer in the not-so-distant future. Problem is, I know basically nothing about different features and such of 3D printers, so I could use some help selecting one.

I would like something in the 100-300 dollar range, just to toy around with stuff and maybe make a few useful things, really a 3D printer just seems like a cool thing to have:sticktongue:

So what would you recommend? Thanks:)
